TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusStrip extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip

summary.span: 表示 Windows 状态栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows status bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替换 控件。 replaces the control. 的特殊功能包括自定义表布局、支持窗体的大小调整和移动手柄，以及支持 属性，这允许 自动填充可用空间。Special features of include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the property, which allows a to fill available space automatically. 以下各项专用于在所有方向上与 和 无缝协作。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 默认情况下，它们在设计时可用于 控件：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - 控件将显示有关在 上查看的对象、对象组件的信息或应用程序内与该对象操作相关的上下文信息。A control displays information about an object being viewed on a , the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application. 通常， 控件由 对象组成，每个对象将显示文本、图标或两者都有。Typically, a control consists of objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both. 也可以包括 、 和 控件。The can also contain , , and controls. 默认 没有面板。The default has no panels. 若要将面板添加到 ，请使用 方法，或在设计时使用[StatusStrip Items 集合编辑器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/ms233631(v=vs.100))来添加、删除或重新排序项以及修改属性。To add panels to a , use the method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/ms233631(v=vs.100)) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties. 在设计时使用 " [StatusStrip 任务" 对话框](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/ms233642(v=vs.90))运行常用命令。Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/ms233642(v=vs.90)) at design time to run common commands. 尽管 替换并扩展了早期版本的 控件，但也可以选择保留 以备向后兼容性和将来使用。Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个具有各种公共属性集的 。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: StatusStrip Items Collection Editor
StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box
StatusStrip Control

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置要停靠在其父控件上的 边框，并确定 如何随其父控件一起调整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a is resized with its parent.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义 自动调整大小的方式。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，将 设置为 会导致 与父控件的左边缘对齐，并在父控件调整大小时进行重设大小。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控件按其 Z 顺序停靠，这是窗体上的控件沿窗体的 Z 轴（深度）的可视化分层。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边缘，也可以停靠到所有边缘并填充父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了具有各种通用属性集的 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使将 属性设置为 `true` 并将 属性设置为 `Visible`，也不会显示大小调整手柄，除非您还将 属性设置为溢出值之一。Even with the property set to `true` and the property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the property to one of the overflow values. 如果 属性设置为 或 ，则不会显示大小调整手柄。If the property is set to or , the sizing grip will not be displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了具有各种通用属性集的 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 "" 属性来显示手柄，以便在 可调整大小时向用户提供指示。You can use the property to display a grip to provide an indication to the user of when a is resizable. 即使将 属性设置为 `true` 并将 属性设置为 `Visible`，也不会显示大小调整手柄，除非您还将 属性设置为溢出值之一。Even with the property set to `true` and the property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the property to one of the overflow values. 如果 属性设置为 或 ，则不会显示大小调整手柄。If the property is set to or , the sizing grip will not be displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了具有各种通用属性集的 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构包装 Windows 发送的消息。The structure wraps messages that Windows sends. 您可以使用此结构来包装消息，并将其分配给要调度的窗口过程。You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched. 你还可以使用此结构来获取有关系统发送到你的应用程序或控件的消息的信息。You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls. 不能直接创建 结构。You cannot create the structure directly. 若要创建 结构，请使用 方法。To create a structure, use the method. 为了更高效地创建 结构， 结构使用其现有 结构的池，而不是创建新的实例（如果可能）。To make creating structures more efficient, the structure uses its pool of existing structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible. 但是，如果 结构在池中不可用，则将创建结构的新实例。However, if a structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
